name: The End Of The Girl
description:
Game Quote

Usually you are the one to kill the zombie in games, but what if the zombie was your daughter, and there is a vaccine on the way?

Game Info

Hard to learn, kinda easy to master, luck based game.

Game Description

The game is about a dad "the player" that has to save his daughter,  that has been infected with "the  zombie". You have to save her by giving a scientist what he needs to make a vaccine while holding off an angry zombiehater.

Controls

WASD or ↑↓→ ←to Move Character

"E" to Interact

ESC to Pause Game

Credits

Unity and Programming: BurgerBoii

art: "Aseprite" BurgerBoii

Music: "Feeling Lucky!" Funky 8 Bit Game Music By HeatleyBros - YouTube

𝐈𝐧𝐟𝐨

I made this game in 2 days. i do not have any experience in both sound, music and art, hence i got music and sounds online. i did though buy Aseprite and try my best with making somewhat of a good looking game in my opinion. this is my first ever gamejam and i hope i did well
